text: Sam Rosen born as Samuel Rosenblum, (born August 12, 1947 in Ulm, Germany) is an American sportscaster currently employed by FOX Sports and MSG. He currently is the television voice of the New York Rangers. His trademark is "It's a power play goal!" He also is the preseason voice of the Chicago Bears and calls NFL games for Fox. His other jobs include these: *New York Knicks TV Studio Host *New York Rangers TV Studio Host *The Herb Brooks Show Host *The Mike Keenan Show Host *BCS on Fox play by play *NHL on Fox play by play *NFL Europe on Fox play by play *NHL Radio play by play *NHL on ESPN play by play *Boxing on ESPN play by play *College Baseball on ESPN play by play *College Football on ESPN play by play *Australian Rules Football on ESPN play by play *Table Tennis on ESPN play by play *New York Cosmos play by play His parent were Jews from Poland, who migrated to the United States.www.newsday.com == References == Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Association football broadcasters Category:Boxing broadcasters Category:College football broadcasters Category:German Jews Category:Jewish American sportspeople Category:National Basketball Association broadcasters Category:National Football League broadcasters Category:National Hockey League broadcasters Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:People from Ulm Category:Polish Jews
title: Sam Rosen
